data.message: Or go back to glass bottles.  Even better glass bottles which can be return (rather than recycled) for sterilising and refilling and giving the consumer a small amount of money back each time... like they do in Germany.

replies.message: Hi Lorna, it’s clear that recycling rates have stalled and there’s a need to address the issue of recycling and on-the-go littering. We believe supporting the introduction of a well –designed deposit returns scheme may help improve recycling rates.
